applicant-information.form-instructions-sin: Please provide your legal name as indicated on your Social Insurance Number (SIN) card or letter.
applicant-information.form-instructions-info: We'll use the information you provide to verify your identity. Any information that does not match the information on your SIN application may cause a delay in the processing of your application.
applicant-information.name-instructions: If using a single legal name, please enter that name in BOTH the first name and last name fields.

communication-preference.note: If you're eligible, we will share your information with Sun Life Assurance Company of Canada (Sun Life). Sun Life will be responsible for handling member enrolment and administering claims processing and benefits for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
communication-preference.preferred-method: What is your preferred method of communication for Sun Life?
communication-preference.preferred-language: What is your preferred official language of communication?
communication-preference.email-note: Service Canada and Health Canada may use this email for future communication about the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
communication-preference.future-email-note: Add your email to receive future communication from Service Canada and Health Canada for the purpose of the Canadian Dental Care Plan.

error-message.email-match: The email addresses entered do not match
error-message.confirm-email-for-future-required: The confirm email address is required.
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com

confirm.alert-heading: You have successfully applied for the Canadian Dental Care Plan!
confirm.make-note: Save this code, you'll need it to check the status of your application.
confirm.keep-copy: Keep a copy of your application
confirm.print-copy-text: You will not be receiving a confirmation email. It is important to keep a copy of your application. You can use this button to print.
confirm.begin-process: We will begin processing your application immediately.
confirm.cdcp-checker: You can use the <cdcpLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan Status Checker</cdcpLink> or call <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap> to track the progress of your application.
confirm.use-code: You can use your application code to begin tracking the progress within 48 hours of applying.
confirm.register-msca-title: Register for a My Service Canada Account
confirm.register-msca-text: Once your application is processed, you will be able to sign into <mscaLink>My Service Canada Account (MSCA)</mscaLink> to view or update your personal information. You will also be able to view any letters sent to you from the Government of Canada regarding the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
confirm.msca-notify: You will be notified whether your application has been accepted or rejected in your My Service Canada Account.
confirm.how-insurance: How do I use my Canadian Dental Care Plan
confirm.eligible-text: If you are deemed eligible, Sun Life will send you a welcome package by mail. Your welcome package will include your member card and details about the Canadian Dental Care Plan, including your coverage start date. The Canadian Dental Care Plan will not cover you for dental services received before that date.
confirm.more-info-cdcp: For more information on what services and how much will be covered, visit <moreInfoLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan - What is covered</moreInfoLink>.
confirm.more-info-service: For more information, please contact <dentalContactUsLink>Service Canada</dentalContactUsLink>.
confirm.consent: Consent: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.

dental-benefits.title: Access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If you meet all the eligibility criteria, your coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no duplication or gaps in coverage.

federal-benefits.title: Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: Do you have dental benefits through a social program offered by a federal program?

social-programs.legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: Do you have dental benefits through a social program offered by your province or territory?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have provincial or territorial benefits.

social-programs.input-legend: If yes, through which province or territory?
social-programs.radio-legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-required: Select whether you have federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: Select whether you have provincial or territorial dental benefits

dental-insurance.title: Access to other dental insurance
dental-insurance.legend: Do you have access to dental insurance or coverage through one of the following four situations?

list.employment: Your employment benefits or a family member's employment benefits, including health and wellness account
list.pension: Your pension benefits or a family member's pension benefits
list.purchased: Purchased by you or a family member or through a group plan from an insurance or benefits company
list.professional: Through a professional or student organization

dental-insurance.option-yes: Yes, I have access to dental insurance or coverage.
dental-insurance.option-no: No, I do not have access to dental insurance or coverage.

additional-info.title: Additional information
additional-info.eligible: Exception: You may still be eligible if you are retired and:

list.opted: you opted out of pension benefits before December 11, 2023, and
list.cannot-opt: you can't opt back in under the pension rules

additional-info.not-eligible: You are still considered to have access to dental insurance or coverage if you choose to opt out of benefits provided through your employer/pension (see exception) benefits or through a professional or student organization. As such, you are not eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
additional-info.not-eligible-purchased: If you purchased your current dental insurance policy privately on your own (and not part of any of the coverage described above), you are not eligible for the CDCP while that coverage is in effect.

error-message.dental-insurance-required: Select whether you have access to dental insurance

radio-options.delegate: I am applying on behalf of someone else

error-message.type-of-application-required: Select who this application is for

tax-filing.form-instructions: Have you and your spouse or common-law partner (if applicable) filed your tax return for 2023 and received your Notice of Assessment?

error-message.tax-filing-required: Select whether or not you have filed your taxes

date-of-birth.description: Applications for the Canadian Dental Care Plan (CDCP) will open in phases. Your date of birth determines when you can apply.
date-of-birth.form-instructions: Please enter your date of birth

error-message.date-of-birth-is-past: The date of birth must be in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-required-and-valid: The date of birth is required and must be a valid date

application-delegate.page-title: Applying on behalf of someone cannot be completed online at this time
application-delegate.contact-representative: You must speak to a Service Canada representative to apply on behalf of someone. Please contact Service Canada at 1-833-537-4342 or visit a Service Canada office near you.
application-delegate.prepare-to-apply: <preparingToApply>Preparing to apply on behalf of someone</preparingToApply>

file-your-taxes.ineligible-to-apply: You are not eligible to apply for the Canada Dental Care Plan at this time.
file-your-taxes.tax-not-filed: You and/or your spouse/common-law partner have not filed a tax return for 2023 with the Canada Revenue Agency.
file-your-taxes.unable-to-assess: We use the information from your tax file to verify that you meet the income eligibility for the CDCP. Until you file your 2023 taxes, we won't be able to assess your eligibility.
file-your-taxes.tax-info: For more information on how to file your taxes, visit <taxInfo>Get ready to do your taxes.</taxInfo>
file-your-taxes.apply-after: Please apply for the plan after you have filed your taxes and received your Notice of Assessment.

dob-eligibility.page-title: Find out when you can apply
dob-eligibility.ineligible-to-apply: You are not currently eligible to apply for the Canada Dental Care Plan. Applications for the Canada Dental Care Plan is opening in phases.
dob-eligibility.eligibility-info: <eligibilityInfo>Find out when you can apply for the Canada Dental Care Plan</eligibilityInfo>

exit-application.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to exit this application? If you click "Exit", the form will reset and your information will be lost.
exit-application.click-back: Click "Back" to return to the form.

index.page-title: Applying for the Canadian Dental Care Plan

partner-information.provide-sin: Provide information on your current spouse or common-law partner as indicated on their SIN card/letter.
partner-information.required-information: This information is required to calculate the adjusted family net income. Please note that the spouse or common-law partner will need to submit their own application to the plan.
partner-information.name-instructions: If using a single legal name, please enter that name in BOTH the first name and last name fields.
partner-information.confirm-checkbox: I confirm that my spouse or common-law partner is aware and has agreed to share their personal information.

error-message.date-of-birth-is-past: The date of birth must be in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-required-and-valid: The date of birth is required and must be a valid date
error-message.sin-unique: The Social Insurance Number (SIN) must be unique

personal-information.form-instructions: Adding a phone number helps Service Canada contact you if there is an issue with your application. Otherwise, we'll contact you by mail.

home-address.use-mailing-address: My mailing address is the same as my home address

error-message.address-required: Enter address, typically number and street
error-message.postal-code-required: Enter postal code or zip code
error-message.postal-code-valid: Enter postal code in the correct format, such as A1A 1A1
error-message.zip-code-valid: Enter zip code in the correct format, such as 12345
error-message.phone-number-valid: Phone number must consist of numbers only
error-message.phone-number-alt-valid: Phone number must consist of numbers only

review-information.read-carefully: Please review this information carefully. The information provided will be used by Sun Life to create your member account and will be reflected on your member card.

spouse-consent.label: Consent
spouse-consent.yes: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
spouse-consent.no: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has not consented to sharing of their personal information.

review-information.dental-benefit-change: Change answer to public dental benefits
review-information.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:
review-information.dental-benefit-has-no-access: Has access to the following benefits:
review-information.submit-p-proceed: By proceeding with this application, you are agreeing to attest truthfully to the information provided.
review-information.submit-p-false-info: If you provide false information on your application, you and others you applied for may be removed from the plan.
review-information.submit-p-repayment: If you or your family members were not eligible to apply, you or your family member may have to repay the full cost of care received through the Canadian Dental Care Plan.

terms-and-conditions.page-heading: Terms and conditions of use and privacy statement
terms-and-conditions.intro-text: Thank you for using the Canadian Dental Care Plan (CDCP) Online Application (“the Online Application”). We have developed terms and conditions for using this service (“Terms”). Please read them carefully.

terms-and-conditions-of-use.heading: Terms and Conditions of Use for the Canadian Dental Care Plan Online Application
terms-and-conditions-of-use.online-application-legal-terms: PLEASE READ CAREFULLY. These Terms for the Canadian Dental Care Plan (CDCP) Online Application contain information about your legal rights and obligations and regulate your use of the Online Application. These Terms should be read in conjunction with the Canada.ca website Terms and Conditions. In case they are differing, the present Terms take precedence over Canada.ca Terms and Conditions.
terms-and-conditions-of-use.online-application-access-terms: Your access to and use of the Online Application, including any and all content, is subject to (1) your acceptance of, and (2) your compliance with these Terms.
terms-and-conditions-of-use.online-application-usage-terms: Every time you use the Online Application, these Terms continue to apply. By using the Online Application, you agree to abide by the following Terms. It is your responsibility to understand and retain these Terms.
terms-and-conditions-of-use.terms-rejection-policy: At any time you may decide not to accept the Terms, in which case you will not be permitted to access and use the Online Application.
terms-and-conditions-of-use.esdc-definition-clarification: In these Terms, “ESDC” refers to the Minister of Employment and Social Development, representing His Majesty the King in Right of Canada.

online-application.heading: Terms of Use of the Online Application:
online-application.self-agreement: Using the Online Application means that you have read and agree to these Terms and the Privacy Notice Statement. If, at any time, you withdraw your agreement to any of the Terms you must stop use of the Online Application.
online-application.on-behalf-of-someone-else: If you are using the Application on behalf of another individual, by using the Application, you certify that you have all the necessary authority, permission, and authorities to agree to the Terms on behalf of that individual, and that you agree to the Terms on your own personal behalf and on behalf of the individual you are representing.
online-application.at-your-own-risk: You are using this service at your own risk, and you will need to keep any personal information safe. Make sure to close the browser or log out when you are done.
online-application.only-use: Only use the Online Application to apply to the CDCP.
online-application.maintenance: There will be times when the system might be down for maintenance.
online-application.inactive: If you are inactive for 15 minutes on the Online Application your session will end and you will lose any information you entered.
online-application.msdc: ESDC uses services from Microsoft Corporation to run the Online Application. The Microsoft data centres used by ESDC are in Canada in accordance with Microsoft Corporation's Terms of Service Agreement.
online-application.antibot: ESDC uses hCaptcha anti-bot services for our online tools in accordance with hCaptcha's <hcaptchaTermsOfService>Terms of Service</hcaptchaTermsOfService>.

disclaimers.heading: Disclaimers
disclaimers.online-application-disclaimer: You understand and agree that ESDC provides the Online Application "as is" with no representation, warranty or guarantee, implied or expressed, of any kind whatsoever and that ESDC disclaims any and all liability in relation to the use of the Online Application, including any loss, damage or injury arising from or related to:
disclaimers.external-factors-disclaimer: any matters or factors outside of its control, including the availability or unavailability of the internet, or telecommunications or other infrastructure systems; or
disclaimers.online-application-information-non-accep: the non-acceptance of information provided through the Online Application; or
disclaimers.non-compliance: non-compliance with any of these Terms.
disclaimers.esdc-liability-indemnification: You hereby agree to indemnify and hold ESDC harmless from any such liability.

changes-to-these-terms-of-use.heading: Changes to these Terms of Use
changes-to-these-terms-of-use.esdc-terms-amendment-policy: ESDC may amend these Terms at any time and without notice. Such changes shall be effective immediately on the date they are published. By using the Online Application, you agree to abide by the amended Terms. You are responsible to ensure you understand and retain the amended Terms.

personal-information.heading: Personal Information
personal-information.service-canada-application-administratio: Service Canada, which is part of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC), administers applications for the Canadian Dental Care Plan (CDCP) on behalf of Health Canada (HC). Service Canada will collect the personal information you include in your CDCP application to validate eligibility against the CDCP criteria.

how-we-protect-your-privacy.heading: How we protect your privacy
how-we-protect-your-privacy.personal-information-collection-and-use-: The collection and use of your personal information is authorized under the Privacy Act, the Department of Health Act, the Dental Care Measures Act, the Department of Employment and Social Development Act, and other applicable laws.
how-we-protect-your-privacy.personal-information-rights-and-access: You have the right to the protection of, access to, and where applicable, the correction of your personal information. It is kept in the following personal information banks:

personal-information-banks.esdc-ppu-712: Canadian Dental Care Plan ESDC PPU 712
personal-information-banks.hc-ppu-440: Canadian Dental Care Plan HC PPU 440

how-we-protect-your-privacy.info-source-access: You can learn how to access this information in the government publication called <infosource>Info Source</infosource>. You can also access Info Source online at any Service Canada Centre.
how-we-protect-your-privacy.esdc-application-third-party-provider: ESDC carries out this application using services from third-party provider Microsoft Corporation, which may be subject to foreign laws. For more information, see: <microsoftDataPrivacyPolicy>Microsoft Data Privacy Policy & Privacy Principles</microsoftDataPrivacyPolicy>.
how-we-protect-your-privacy.personal-information-handling-complaint-: If you don't agree with the way your personal information was handled by Service Canada, you can contact the Privacy Commissioner of Canada to <fileacomplaint>file a complaint</fileacomplaint>.

who-we-can-share-your-information-with.heading: Who we can share your information with
who-we-can-share-your-information-with.esdc-personal-information-sharing: ESDC will share your personal information with partners in administrating the plan to validate your eligibility and register you for the CDCP.
who-we-can-share-your-information-with.benefits-administration-data-disclosure: Your data may also be disclosed to the CDCP benefits administrator, the benefits administrator's agents and service providers for the purpose of underwriting, verification, administration, adjudication and investigation of claims under CDCP.
who-we-can-share-your-information-with.esdc-information-usage-policy: ESDC may use or share the information you provide for policy analysis, research, monitoring and/or evaluation activities within ESDC and HC. These uses or activities will not affect any administrative decisions made about you.

what-happens-if-you-dont-give-us-your-in.heading: What happens if you dont give us your information
what-happens-if-you-dont-give-us-your-in.text: Participation in the CDCP is voluntary; however, if you do not provide your personal information in your application, you cannot be considered for the CDCP.

apply.application-start-consent: By continuing this application you consent to the above Terms and Conditions of use and the Privacy Notice Statement.
